Title: Directs the public service commission to create an agrivoltaics incentive program
Summary: Directs the public service commission, in consultation with the New York State energy research and development authority, to create an agrivoltaics incentive program to support agrivoltaic projects designed to maximize agricultural and environmental co-benefits.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the public service commission to create an agrivoltaics incentive program
